entry.title: CI/CD for Serverless Applications
entry.summary:
Description

"CI/CD for Serverless Applications" by: Marcia Villalba To get the most out of the agility afforded by serverless, it is essential to build CI/CD pipelines that help teams iterate on code and quickly release features. Serverless and distributed systems in production cannot be done any other way than with a good and efficient CI/CD pipeline.

Recorded at the 2020 Python Web Conference (https://2020.pythonwebconf.com)
